title: My Moody Pup: ambKids Academy Learning Tools Read-Understanding Emotions
description: 5-year old, Jade describes the different moods her new puppy displaysAs she gets to know him.My moody pup is a social skill read on understanding emotions via body Language and facial expression.About ambKids AcademyambKids Academy is an advocacy project with a goal of improving state wide test scores, reading, writing, and life skills training, through learning tool workbooks, publishing books with target messages for youth in areas that will build self-esteem, healthy body image, and social-economic enrichment to better serve the youth in our communities.
author: Jade Smith
